data.text:
@IamMsFF @PplFuture @SolomonYue It is because it is illogical to adopt a 'zeroing policy'. The goal is unrealistic and unreachable.  To identify seriously ill patients for treatment is the most appropriate action.
Hk gov only follows china's practice.

@IamMsFF @SolomonYue Scary from HK.. China’s Regime changing Hong Kong into Wuhan…
